Object# PartialSimulateRefundDeclineError

Advanced Commerce API 1.1+

```
object PartialSimulateRefundDeclineError
```

## [Properties](/documentation/AdvancedCommerceAPI/PartialSimulateRefundDeclineError#properties)

`errorCode``number`

 Value: `4000184``errorMessage``string`

 Value: `If one item has a refundReason value of SIMULATE_REFUND_DECLINE, all items must have a refundReason value of SIMULATE_REFUND_DECLINE.`## [See Also](/documentation/AdvancedCommerceAPI/PartialSimulateRefundDeclineError#see-also)
